column4: So...does anyone know what script is run to handle resume from hibernation?
think that actually is a kernel thing but it should be suspend
It's got to be a shell script, it spits a diff out at me instead of running the script. :) Something broke in an upgrade
think it's suspend or resume the script is named
I m not to famialar with suspend sicne I tend to stay away from it since it breaks a lot of times
Actualy I'm pretty sure the geforce 2 cards are no longer supported as of 97xx
no they are still supported my card works fine in regular nvidia card
With the 97xx driver? I know it works with 9729
but then again geforce 2 mx 440 is not really a geforce2 card
well considering that 97xx drivers are not out
They'll probably be in feisty too
well geforce2 mx 440 are still being made my geforce 2 mx 440 is DirectX 9 compatible
*shrug* Just repeating what I've heard, I've never owned a geforce 2 of any kind
